title: Gentle correction for the high flown backslider, or, A soft answer to turn away strife being a general answer (in few words) to some queries, and defamations thrown out by the furious spirit in some of the people called Quakers against the rationalls : with motives for their return to the witnesses that leadeth out of self into eternity / by him of whom the world is not worthy, known by the name of Roger Crabb.
author: Crab, Roger, 1621?-1680.
